problemAgitation.title: Sound Familiar?

painPoints.title: The Time Drain
painPoints.body: You're a developer, not a copywriter. But every new project means hours of writing, formatting, and designing proposals in Word or Canva. That's unpaid time you'll never get back.

painPoints.title: The Black Hole
painPoints.body: You hit send on a proposal you spent hours perfecting. Then nothing. No reply. No rejection. Just silence. Did they even open it? You have no idea.

painPoints.title: The Guessing Game
painPoints.body: Too early feels pushy. Too late and they've moved on. Without knowing if they've read your proposal—or what caught their attention—you're just guessing.

problemAgitation.closingStatement: The average freelancer spends 20+ hours per month on proposals. That's 2-3 billable projects worth of time—wasted on paperwork and wondering.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.body: Try Waco3 risk-free. If it doesn't save you time and help you win clients, we'll refund every penny. No questions asked.

items.q: Do my clients need to create an account to view proposals?
items.a: Nope. Clients click your link and see a beautiful proposal instantly. No signup, no login, no friction. They see your work; you see their engagement data.

The AI creates a strong first draft with professional structure and persuasive language. Then you customize it with your specific project details, voice, and expertise. The result sounds like you—just faster.

items.q: What kind of analytics do I get?
items.a: You'll see: total viewing time, time spent per section, number of views, return visits, device type (mobile/desktop), engagement score (High/Medium/Low), session recordings showing scroll behavior, and AI-generated insights about what to do next.
Absolutely. Generate professional PDFs with your branding for clients who prefer attachments. Web links give you tracking; PDFs give you flexibility. Use both.

items.q: What if I already have proposal templates I like?
items.a: Import them. Or use AI to recreate them based on a description. You can also save any proposal as a template for future use. Build a library of your best work.
Yes. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We never share your proposals or client information with third parties. Your work stays yours.

items.q: Can I use Waco3 in Spanish?
items.a: Sí. Waco3 is fully available in English and Spanish. AI can generate proposals in either language—and translate between them.

items.q: What happens after my free trial?
items.a: After your trial, choose the plan that works for you. Your proposals and data are never deleted. If you decide Waco3 isn't for you, export everything and cancel anytime.
Yes. 30-day money-back guarantee, no questions asked. We're confident Waco3 will save you time and win you clients—but if it doesn't, you pay nothing.
